applicant-name.name: ZHONGRUI GUONENG TECH DONGGUAN CO LTD
中瑞国能科技（东莞）有限公司

invention-title: Water electrolysis hydrogen production membrane electrode of high-entropy alloy oxide
一种高熵合金氧化物的水电解制氢膜电极

abstract.p: The invention discloses a high-entropy alloy oxide water electrolysis hydrogen production membrane electrode, and belongs to the technical field of water electrolysis hydrogen production, and the high-entropy alloy oxide water electrolysis hydrogen production membrane electrode is prepared by the following steps: respectively spraying cathode catalyst layer slurry and anode catalyst layer slurry on two sides of a proton exchange membrane, and drying to obtain a cathode catalyst layer and an anode catalyst layer arranged on two sides of the proton exchange membrane; and respectively arranging a cathode gas diffusion layer and an anode gas diffusion layer on the cathode and anode catalyst layers, and carrying out hot pressing treatment to obtain the membrane electrode. The anode catalyst and the cathode catalyst are both made of high-entropy alloy/high-entropy oxide nanometer materials, and the catalyst has the advantages of being low in cost, long in service life, good in catalytic activity and the like. In the synthesis process of the catalyst, the modified carbon nano tube is added as a carbon carrier, so that the loading capacity can be effectively improved, namely, the content and density of effective components in the catalyst are improved, the catalytic effect can be further improved, and the electrode is endowed with efficient electrolytic hydrogen production capacity.

本发明公开了一种高熵合金氧化物的水电解制氢膜电极，属于水电解制氢技术领域，其通过如下步骤制备：在质子交换膜的两侧分别喷涂阴极催化层浆料和阳极催化层浆料，干燥，得到设置在质子交换膜两侧的阴极催化层和阳极催化层；在所述阴阳极催化层上分别设置阴极气体扩散层和阳极气体扩散层，并进行热压处理，得到所述膜电极。本发明的阳极催化剂和阴极催化剂采用的都是高熵合金/高熵氧化物纳米材料，具备催化剂成本低，使用寿命长、催化活性好等优点；且本发明通过在催化剂合成过程中，加入改性碳纳米管作为碳载体，能够有效提升负载量，也即提升催化剂中有效成分的含量及密度，能够进一步提升催化效果，赋予电极高效的电解制氢能力。
